nodes.bodyText: I think getName() is a unique identifier.  I believe it is the case name and a time stamp.
Yes it's the case name + timestamp, but I don't exactly consider that a UUID? Especially since you use an actual UUID in one of the other temp paths.
Sure.  Change it from 'uuid' to 'unique identifier'?
I think just "case name and timestamp" so there's no confusion
Ok.  Should be pushed up now.
